values: 以…为根据；禁飞；禁足；限制外出；使搁浅；触海底；放置在地面上；把（电器）接地
研磨；粉碎；打磨；（grind的过去式和过去分词）
地面；土地；开阔地；场地；庭院；花园；基础；根据；理由；领域；范围；（绘画或印刷的）背景；底子；底色；沉淀物；接地（装置）；地线；接地端；（某种用途的）地域；水域

synonym.mean: 使接触地面；打基础；使搁浅
土地的；地面上的；磨碎的；磨过的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 磨的；刺耳的；令人难以忍受的
[机] 研磨机；研磨者；磨工；臼齿
[电] 接地；基础；搁浅；（染色的）底色

word_mean_info__list.difference: 特指潮湿时发粘，而火烤后变坚硬的泥土。
指湿土，尤指雨后稀泥、污泥。
特指土壤干燥后，飞扬于空中的细微泥土。
通常指大地的表面，也可指土壤、泥土或场地。
含义笼统。指与河流、海洋相对的陆地，也指可耕种的土地。
多指地表带有水分的泥土，较具体。
特指适宜栽种农作物或生长各种植物的泥土。
主要用作抽象或引申意义。
含义与basis和foundation接近。一般指某种决定、论点或关系的基础，也可指某种原因的基础。
侧重指构成或支撑某一具体物体的基础，也可指军事基地或用作比喻意义。
用于具体意义时，侧重指坚固结实的建筑物的基础或地基；用作比喻意义时，与basis基本相同。

word_group.brief_definition: 中间立场, 折衷方案
当场, 在现场；(尤指)处于战火中
着地；撞击地面；[美国俚语]倒塌
基本原则；场地临时规则
繁殖地；产卵地；发源地；滋生地；中心
地面测量
地面雷达
基本规则；基础规则；基本准则
完全（或彻底）地；完全（或彻底）的
理由是；鉴于；由于
底层, 底楼, 一楼
失宠, 失去欢迎度；失去优势
躲藏起来, 潜伏下来
共同立论基础
地水准平面；基态
爆心投影点；基础；起点；纽约世贸中心废墟
地被；地被植物；矮小植物
在地面以下；在地下
试验地；武器试验场
牛肉糜

bilingual.source: The ground seemed to heave below her feet.
bilingual.target: 地面似乎在她脚下隆起。

bilingual.source: Leave the building quickly when the ground stops shaking.
bilingual.target: 地面停止晃动时迅速离开建筑物。

bilingual.source: Where should you stay before the ground stops shaking?
bilingual.target: 在地面停止震动前你应该待在哪里？

bilingual.source: The floors above the ground have Culture and Community areas.
bilingual.target: 地面以上的楼层有文化和社区区域。

bilingual.source: At that moment, the ground seemed to heave below her feet.
bilingual.target: 那一刻，地面似乎在她脚下隆起。

bilingual.source: It was sunny, but the ground was wet from rain in the morning.
bilingual.target: 天气晴朗，但地面因早晨的雨水而湿滑。

bilingual.source: The height of the track varies from eight to ten meters above ground.
bilingual.target: 轨道高度在地面上方八到十米之间变化。

bilingual.source: Almost immediately Ruby felt a rumbling in the ground beneath her.
bilingual.target: 几乎立刻，露比感觉到她脚下的地面在震动。

list.abstract: ground(英[ɡraʊnd]，美[ɡraʊnd])，英语单词。作名词为大地；地面；场地。作动词为禁止…飞行；使停飞；使（船）搁浅。作形容词为地面的；地勤的；磨碎的。例句：He carefully lined up his shot (镜头) and waited hopefully till the sun reached the ground.(他小心地摆好镜头，满怀希望地等待着，直到太阳落山)。 作名词时，近义词为extent。boundary、region。作及物动词时，近义词为strand。作不及物动词时，近义词为beach、to land。作形容词时，近义词为oppressed。作动词时、近义词为oppressed。反义词是figure。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you get it off the ground?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那怎么离开地面呢？

yingyinNormal.en: She's safe on the ground. How about you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她在地面上很安全，那你呢？

yingyinNormal.en: And if you touched the ground, burn you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你掉到地面，我会烧掉你。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you afraid of? I feel a shaking of the ground I stand on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在害怕什么？我觉得脚下的地面在颤抖。

yingyinNormal.en: Ground Control to Major Tom. Can you hear me, Major Tom?
yingyinNormal.zh: 地面管制呼叫汤姆中校。有收到讯号吗，汤姆中校？

yingyinNormal.en: I won't commit my people to a ground assault, just to pillage weapons.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能为了抢夺武器就让我的军队陷入地面战争。

yingyinNormal.en: Camponotus pennsylvanicus. Alternatively known as a carpenter ant. Ideal for ground and air transport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 宾夕法尼亚弓背蚁，俗称木工蚁，适合于地面和航空运输。

yingyinNormal.en: These animals can replace thousands of boots on the ground. How many lives would that save?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种动物在地面上可以代替成千上万个机器人，这将会拯救多少生命？

yingyinNormal.en: This process requires a lot of cushion space between the point she starts falling and the ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个过程要求在她开始下落的地点到地面之间有一个很大的缓冲空间。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a stark landscape with one striking feature--this narrow trench that's being cut into the ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个荒凉的地方，没有任何特色，这种狭隘的沟渠的被削减到地面。

yingyinNormal.en: It's more effective to use our capabilities to help partners on the ground secure their own country's futures.
yingyinNormal.zh: 利用我们的军事优势帮助我们的盟友在地面保护他们自己国家的安全是更有效的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been with Appropriations. Bypass Ways and Means? No. To pay for more ground troops in Syria if we need them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直在和拨款委员会谈。想绕过筹款委吗？不是，为向叙利亚派地面部队增兵作拨款准备。

yingyinNormal.en: AG-flying is a different type of flying than virtually anything else, because of the precision and closeness to the ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 特技飞行是一种不同的飞行可以说和其他的飞行完全不同因为飞行的高度里地面相当的近。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I'm just an idiot, but I'm on the ground. I can bring you home. No. No, no. It's too late now. No, it's not, it's not too late.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是个白痴，但我在地面上。我可以带你回家。不，不，已经太迟了。不，还不迟。

yingyinNormal.en: The ground is getting quite steep. I don't like cycling up hills. But look at the beautiful view. My goodness, this is hard work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地面现在非常陡了。我不喜欢骑自行车上坡。可以看到漂亮的景色。我的天啊，这真是累人的工作。

yingyinNormal.en: The cell towers were operating at more than 200 watts, producing ground-level absorption figures far in excess of the SAR limit of 1.6 watts per kilogram.
yingyinNormal.zh: 信号塔运作功率超过200瓦，因此产生的地面接收信号远超SAR系统每千米1.6瓦的限制。

yingyinNormal.en: And the best way to defeat a group like ISIL isn't by sending large numbers of American combat forces to wage a ground war in the heart of the Middle East.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打击ISIL这样的极端组织，最好的方式并不是派遣大量美国部队，深入中东的腹地进行地面战争。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you know I've always shown restraint in the past, but I'm going to be making an executive order for military action. Air strikes followed by ground troops.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道我过去一直在尽量克制，但是我打算发布行政命令部署军事行动了。先空袭然后地面部队进驻。

yingyinNormal.en: First, we have to find a puddle. Oh, there aren't any muddy puddles. The ground is too dry for muddy puddles. I wish it would rain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们先得找到一个泥坑才行。哦，这个地方一个泥坑也没有。地面太干燥了，一个泥坑也没有。要是能下场雨就好了。

yingyinNormal.en: The additional American forces I've ordered to Iraq will help Iraqi and Kurdish forces with the training, and intelligence and equipment they need to take the fight to these terrorists on the ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 经我命令派遣到伊拉克的特别武装人员将为伊拉克和库尔德武装提供培训、情报支援和武器装备，支持其开展地面的反恐战争。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (from the ground up)彻底地; 从头开始

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无理由的；无根据的

word_family.mean: v. 禁止…飞行；使停飞；使（船）搁浅；使…建立在牢固的理论基础上；把…放在地上；以…触地；把…接地；罚…不准外出社交；磨碎；碾碎；打磨；（grind的过去式和过去分词）

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 完全(或彻底)地；完全(或彻底)的

examination_example.sentence: Most <highlight>ground</highlight> surveys involve a lot of walking, looking for surface clues such as small fragments of pottery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数地面调查都需要大量的步行，寻找表面线索，如陶器的小碎片。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Ground</highlight> surveys allow archaeologists to pinpoint the places where digs will be successful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地面调查使考古学家能够精确定位挖掘将能成功的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists also may locate buried remains by using such technologies as <highlight>ground</highlight> radar, magnetic-field recording, and metal detectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家也可以利用地面雷达、磁场记录和金属探测器等技术来定位埋藏的遗骸。

examination_example.sentence: Successive governments have permitted such increases on the <highlight>grounds</highlight> that the cost of investing in and running the rail network should be borne by those who use it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 历届政府都允许这种增长，理由是投资和运营铁路网的成本应该由使用它的人承担。

examination_example.sentence: But there are few places where clients have more <highlight>grounds</highlight> for complaint than America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是很少有哪个地方的客户比美国的客户更有理由抱怨。

examination_example.sentence: Negative attitudes toward obesity, <highlight>grounded</highlight> in health concerns, have stimulated a number of anti-obesity studies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于对健康的担忧，对肥胖的负面态度已经刺激了许多反肥胖研究。

examination_example.sentence: We quickly "thin slice" information reliably only after we <highlight>ground</highlight> such snap reactions in "thick sliced" long-term study.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们只有将快速反应建立在长期研究的基础上，才能可靠地一句少量信息作出快速反应。

sense_info_list.en: an area of knowledge or experience

examination_example.sentence: Looking beyond the culture war logic of right or wrong means opening up the middle <highlight>ground</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 超越对错的文化战争逻辑意味着开辟中间地带。

sense_info_list.zh: (from the ground up)彻底地; 从头开始

examination_example.sentence: The start-ups represented a new wave of technology designed from the <highlight>ground</highlight> up for the smartphone world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些初创公司代表了一股为智能手机领域从头开始设计的新技术浪潮。

examination_example.sentence: Their Olaf Street Study, a square of brick-strewn waste <highlight>ground</highlight>, is one of the few works here to embrace the commonplaceness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的奥拉夫街书房是一个布满砖块的荒地，是这里为数不多的拥抱共性的作品之一。

examination_example.sentence: Surely there must be some middle <highlight>ground</highlight> that balances zoos treatment of animals with their educational potential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，必须要有一些中间立场来平衡动物园对待动物的方式和它们的教育潜力。

sense_info_list.en: an area of land used for a particular purpose or activity

word_usage.usage:
ground作“场地；庭园”、“理由”、“渣滓”等解时，常以复数形式出现，如：
They entered the grounds ahead of us.
他们在我们前面走进了院子。
ground作“地面”解时一般只用单数形式。ground在作“土地；泥土”、“范围；内容；话题”等解时可用作不可数名词，“一块地”说a piece of ground。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 尤指作为某种决定、辩论或关系的基础，主要指经过证实的理由等。
语气较强，多指“坚实的基础”。
指具体的有形的基础，可指任何物体的底部。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无理由的；无根据的

word_family.mean: v. 禁止…飞行；使停飞；使（船）搁浅；使…建立在牢固的理论基础上；把…放在地上；以…触地；把…接地；罚…不准外出社交；磨碎；碾碎；打磨；（grind的过去式和过去分词）

sense_info_list.en: an area of land used for a particular purpose or activity

examination_example.sentence: The well roared and suddenly ejected mud and six tons of drilling pipe out of the <highlight>ground</highlight>, terrifying those present.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 油井轰鸣，突然将泥浆和六吨重的钻井管从地下喷射出来，吓坏了在场的人。

sense_info_list.en: an area of knowledge or experience

examination_example.sentence: 70 percent of king penguins could either disappear or be forced to find new breeding <highlight>grounds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 70%的帝企鹅要么消失，要么被迫寻找新的繁殖地。

examination_example.sentence: Unless current greenhouse gas emissions drop, 70 percent of king penguins will be forced to relocate their breeding <highlight>grounds</highlight>, or face extinction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非当前的温室气体排放量下降，否则将有70％的帝企鹅被迫迁移繁殖地，或者将面临灭绝。

examination_example.sentence: As the distance between their breeding, <highlight>grounds</highlight> and their food grows, entire colonies could be wiped out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着它们的繁殖地和觅食地之间的距离越来越远，整个栖息地可能会被消灭。

examination_example.sentence: Some king penguins may be able to relocate to new breeding <highlight>grounds</highlight> closer to their retreating food source.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些帝企鹅能够在离食物源更近的地方重新安置新的繁殖地。

examination_example.sentence: The study by Greenpeace found they were increasingly operating in the immediate vicinity of penguin colonies and whale feeding <highlight>grounds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绿色和平组织 (Greenpeace) 发现他们越来越多地在企鹅聚居地和鲸鱼觅食地附近作业。

examination_example.sentence: This means that king penguins have to travel further to their feeding <highlight>grounds</highlight>, leaving their hungry chicks for longer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着帝企鹅必须去更远的地方觅食，使得它们离开饥饿幼雏的时间更长。

examination_example.sentence: The Grand Tourist was typically a young man with a thorough <highlight>grounding</highlight> in Greek and Latin literature as well as some leisure time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “大游客”(Grand Tourist)通常是年轻人，有扎实的希腊和拉丁文学方面的基础，并且有一些休闲时间。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 特指潮湿时发粘, 而火烤后变坚硬的泥土。
特指土壤干燥后, 飞扬于空中的细微泥土。
多指地表带有水分的泥土, 较具体。
通常指大地的表面, 也可指土壤、泥土或场地。
含义笼统, 指与河流、海洋相对的陆地, 也指可耕种的土地。
指湿土, 尤指雨后稀泥、污泥。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an area of land used for a particular purpose or activity

examination_example.sentence: Its breeding <highlight>grounds</highlight> are now better preserved.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的繁殖地现在得到了更好的保护。

examination_example.sentence: The whales travel to feeding <highlight>grounds</highlight> off the Northeast Coast in the early spring.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早春，鲸鱼前往东北海岸附近的觅食地。

examination_example.sentence: To seek breeding <highlight>grounds</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 寻找繁殖地。

word_usage.usage:
group是集体名词，用法同family、 team、government等。“a group of+ (复数)名词或代词”常接谓语动词的复数形式：
A group of my friends think I should take a holiday.
我的一些朋友认为我该休假。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 特指潮湿时发粘，而火烤后变坚硬的泥土。
特指土壤干燥后，飞扬于空中的细微泥土。
多指地表带有水分的泥土，较具体。
通常指大地的表面，也可指土壤、泥土或场地。
含义笼统，指与河流、海洋相对的陆地，也指可耕种的土地。
指湿土，尤指雨后稀泥、污泥。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (兴趣、知识或思想的)范围; 领域

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 前景；最显著的位置

word_family.mean: v. 禁止…飞行；使停飞；使（船）搁浅；使…建立在牢固的理论基础上；把…放在地上；以…触地；把…接地；罚…不准外出社交；磨碎；碾碎；打磨；（grind的过去式和过去分词）

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 基本原则；场地临时规则
基本规则；基础规则；基本准则

examination_example.sentence: Come and work out with our qualified personal trainer, Jodie McGregor, on the <highlight>grounds</highlight> of the Middleton Lodge estate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来吧，和我们的专业私人教练Jodie McGregor一起在Middleton庄园健身。

examination_example.sentence: The thief drops to the <highlight>ground</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小偷倒在地上。

examination_example.sentence: On the <highlight>ground</highlight>, it gets 35 miles per gallon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在地面上，它每加仑能跑35英里。

examination_example.sentence: Every time you make coffee, dry the leftover coffee <highlight>grounds</highlight> and keep them in small balls, then place the balls in the kitchen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每次你做咖啡的时候，把剩下的咖啡渣晾干做成小球，然后把小球放在厨房里。

examination_example.sentence: One of the <highlight>ground</highlight> rules of the swap should be that everyone must try on the clothes before they take them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交换的基本规则之一应该是，每个人都必须在穿衣服之前试穿。

sense_info_list.zh: (兴趣、知识或思想的)范围; 领域

word_usage.usage:
group是集体名词，用法同family、 team、government等。“a group of+ (复数)名词或代词”常接谓语动词的复数形式：
A group of my friends think I should take a holiday.
我的一些朋友认为我该休假。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 着地；撞击地面；[美国俚语]倒塌
当场；在现场；(尤指)处于战火中

examination_example.sentence: You can just pick it out of the <highlight>ground</highlight> or off a plant and put it into a basket!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以把它从地上或植物上摘下来，放进篮子里！

examination_example.sentence: It just takes a moment to stop and pick something up off the <highlight>ground</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只是需要一点时间停下来，从地上捡起一些东西。

examination_example.sentence: They even put their noses to the <highlight>ground</highlight> and scratched their heads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们甚至把鼻子贴在地上挠头。

examination_example.sentence: Early humans noticed new trees growing from the seeds (种子) that fell to the <highlight>ground</highlight> from the fruits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 早期人类注意到新树是从果实掉落到土壤里的的种子中生长出来的。

examination_example.sentence: "It's been in the <highlight>ground</highlight> for many years," she thought.
examination_example.sentence_trans: "它在土壤里已经有很多年了，"她想。

examination_example.sentence: It goes into the <highlight>ground</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它（水）渗入土壤。

sense_info_list.en: an area of knowledge or experience

examination_example.sentence: Apple has lost large <highlight>ground</highlight> to the home brands in recent years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，苹果在很大程度上输给了本土品牌。

examination_example.sentence: There should be some middle <highlight>ground</highlight> between the two.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两者之间应该有一些中间立场。
